title: The green revolution’s under way let’s meet again!
lead: Join us on June 9th for a net zero festival and on June 23rd for a consultants’ conference and awards ceremony

title: EU bank and French hydrogen association join forces to support industry
lead: Their collaboration is aimed at facilitating access to EIB’s financing solutions and expertise for hydrogen project promoters in France

title: Government unleases ten point climate plan: Industry responds
lead: The Prime Minister has set out the UK’s ten point plan to tackle climate change, deliver net zero and launch a ‘green industrial revolution’ – but what does the industry think?

title: Tidal energy project on remote North Welsh island secures £1.2m funding
lead: The project is claimed to turn Bardsey Island into the world’s first ‘blue energy’ island which could be entirely powered by wave energy

title: Boris Johnson unveils ten point plan to tackle climate change, deliver net zero and launch a ‘green industrial revolution’
lead: The Prime Minister says the new plans will create and support up to 250,000 British jobs while allowing the UK to ‘forge ahead with eradicating its contribution to climate change by 2050’

title: US provides $130m for research into solar energy technologies
lead: It is supporting 67 research projects across 30 states that reduce the cost of solar, increase US manufacturing competitiveness and improve the reliability of the electric grid

title: Government brings forward the end of road for petrol and diesel cars to 2030
lead: That is part of a £12bn ten-point plan announced by the Prime Minister to stimulate a ‘green industrial revolution’, which could create 250,000 jobs

title: UK launches research into space-based solar power station
lead: The space-based solar power systems would use very large solar satellites to collect renewable energy, convert it into radio waves and safely beam it back to ground-based receivers connected to the electric grid

title: ‘AI will reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 16% in next three to five years’
lead: Nearly half of 400 businesses surveyed are already using AI for climate action

title: UK appoints champion to support businesses towards net zero goal
lead: Mr Griffith will work towards supporting ‘as many UK businesses as possible’ to commit to net zero targets by 2050 or earlier
